Class LinkState

Hierarchy

  • LinkState

Index

Methods

  • preservePage

Methods

Static preservePage

  • preservePage(): void
    • Defined in Foo.ts:313

    For each element with the .preserve-page class, the element's href's continue URL parameter is changed to the current URL.

    example
    <!-- Current URL is https://example.com/?continue=page2 -->
<a href="page?continue=foo">Link</a>

    After LinkState.preservePage():

    <a href="page?continue=https%3A%2F%2Fexample.com%2F%3Fcontinue%3Dpage2">Link</a>

    Returns void

Static preserveState

  • preserveState(): void
    • Defined in Foo.ts:338

    For each element with the .preserve-state class, the element's href's continue URL parameter is changed to the current continue URL parameter. Essentially, the continue URL parameter is passed along, but not modified.

    example
    <!-- Current URL is https://example.com/?continue=page2 -->
<a href="page?continue=foo">Link</a>

    After LinkState.preserveState():

    <a href="page?continue=page2">Link</a>

    Returns void
